attributes.action: Challenge holiday companies to reduce prices during school holidays.
attributes.additional_details:
Family holidays are an essential part of life, a great way to learn about the world around us, create memories and support relationships in family units. 
There would be an increase in school attendance, it would help to support mental health, people could afford to take a well earned break more often. There would be more money put into surrounding companies as people could afford to travel more.
attributes.background: I would like the government to stop holiday companies increasing their prices during school holidays. Make them more affordable all year round.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726455
